park_model

Class JobSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • park_model.JobSchedule

  • public class JobSchedule
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JobSchedule(boolean test)
      Constructor used to create an empty JobSchedule for testing purposes.
      JobSchedule(java.lang.String jobFile)
      Constructs a list of all jobs in the system from the back-end data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addJob(Job theJob)
      Adds a job to the list of jobs if it doesn't violate any business rules; returns true if the job is successfully added, false otherwise.
      java.util.List<Job> getJobsByPark(java.lang.String thePark)
      Returns an unmodifiable list of future jobs scheduled at the given park.
      java.util.List<Job> getJobsForSignUp(User theVolunteer)
      Returns an unmodifiable list of jobs that the volunteer can sign up for, excluding all jobs that violate business rules.
      java.util.List<Job> getUpcomingJobsByVolunteer(User theVolunteer)
      Returns an unmodifiable list of future jobs that the given volunteer is signed up for.
      boolean isWeekFull(Job theJob)
      Returns true if the week surrounding the proposed job has already reached maximum jobs, false otherwise.
      int numberOfJobs()
      Returns the number of scheduled jobs.
      void saveList(java.lang.String theFile)
      Writes all list information to the back-end storage.
      boolean tooManyExistingJobs()
      Checks if the system will allow a new job to be scheduled based on system capacity.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • addJob

        public void addJob(Job theJob)
        Adds a job to the list of jobs if it doesn't violate any business rules; returns true if the job is successfully added, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        theJob - The job to be added.

      • tooManyExistingJobs

        public boolean tooManyExistingJobs()
        Checks if the system will allow a new job to be scheduled based on system capacity.
        Returns:
        true if there is space in the system to schedule a new job, false otherwise.

      • isWeekFull

        public boolean isWeekFull(Job theJob)
        Returns true if the week surrounding the proposed job has already reached maximum jobs, false otherwise. "Week" is += 3 days.
        Returns:
        true if the week surrounding the proposed job has already reached maximum jobs, false otherwise.

      • numberOfJobs

        public int numberOfJobs()
        Returns the number of scheduled jobs.
        Returns:
        The number of scheduled jobs.

        Returns an unmodifiable list of future jobs that the given volunteer is signed up for.
        Parameters:
        theVolunteer - The volunteer being searched for.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable list of future jobs that the given volunteer is signed up for.
